A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILER!!! One of the worst Star Wars movies! Very Disney like jokes throughout the film\, the made Luke look like dumb dad from a Nickelodeon tv show. The questions people have been asking for the past two years got an answer in the way of rays parents don’t matter cause they were just som drunks and Snoke\, even though he is the strongest character we have made and has the most mystery behind his character\, let’s not tell anyone who he is or where he came from and let’s just kill him off. I’m so disappointed! I love Star Wars so much but this movie almost ruined the whole Star Wars universe for me.
